summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of West 61st Street, from 14th Avenue Northwest to 15th Avenue Northwest, by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Majority Petition No. 101226 to the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment of said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by mode of "Payment by Bonds".
